text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    219006Current drinker
    105542008Non - drinker
    82581004 Ex-drinker
    86933000Heavy drinker
    228277002Light drinker
    43783005Moderate drinker
    28127009Social drinker
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 228273003 (Finding relating to alcohol drinking behavior)

name: AlcoholDrinkingStatus
title: Alcohol Drinking Status
publisher: National Resource Center for EHR Standards
description: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of finding relating to alcohol drinking behavior (finding) of the SNOMED CT
